title: [1.7.10-1.8][HAYO][ZeldaSwordSkills——塞尔达剑技]-剑技|冒险|地牢
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1120854593 于 2017-6-9 11:03 编辑 
=前言= 塞尔达剑技
为MC添加了丰富的内容
-地牢 怪物-
-剑技 武器-
-魔法 生命-
-药水 道具-


=教程= 
详细请见由zs447011630的教程


=图片= 





=更新= 本
帖
更
新
 2015/6/12
- 发布帖子


2015/8/10
- 更新帖子


2016/2/7 
- 修改帖子排版
- 更新模组版本                        
 模
组
更新1.7.10 v2.4: Deku Babas
Added:
+ Mob: Deku Babas
+ Mob: Fire Babas
+ Mob: Withered Babas
+ API: A whole bunch of Animation and AI classes; yes, I reinvented the wheel, and I'm proud of it. 
+ Config: Option to completely disable bomb flower generation
+ Config: Option to completely disable song pillar generation

Changed:
- API: IEntityBombIngestible added setters for damage, radius, and fuse time
- Slightly decreased bomb rendering scale

Fixed Bugs:
- Events related to world time (e.g. fairy respawn) could be infinitely prevented by the /set time command
- Fixed hit box of thrown bombs being way too small
- Unable to use ZSSEntityInfo#onBombIngested when implementing IEntityBombEater methods due to type mismatch
- Ingested bombs failing to reliably cause fatal damage when expected
- CustomExplosions using the bomb-throwing entity as the direct rather than indirect entity for the damage source
- Fairy bottle tooltip using incorrect translation keys
- Incorrect help message for ZSSWeaponRegistry command
- Lakes and lava pools still occasionally through Boss Dungeons, breaking them


1.8 v3.2: Deku Babas (BG2 users - still use 1.0.10.0)
Added:
+ Mob: Deku Babas
+ Mob: Fire Babas
+ Mob: Withered Babas
+ API: A whole bunch of Animation and AI classes; yes, I reinvented the wheel, and I'm proud of it. 
+ Config: Option to completely disable bomb flower generation
+ Config: Option to completely disable song pillar generation

Changed:
- API: IEntityBombIngestible added setters for damage, radius, and fuse time
- Slightly decreased bomb rendering scale

Fixed Bugs:
- Tile for defeated boss dungeons set at incorrect coordinates
- Events related to world time (e.g. fairy respawn) could be infinitely prevented by the /set time command
- Fixed hit box of thrown bombs being way too small
- Unable to use ZSSEntityInfo#onBombIngested when implementing IEntityBombEater methods due to type mismatch
- Ingested bombs failing to reliably cause fatal damage when expected
- CustomExplosions using the bomb-throwing entity as the direct rather than indirect entity for the damage source
- Incorrect help message for ZSSWeaponRegistry command
- Lakes and lava pools still occasionally through Boss Dungeons, breaking them

......

replies.author: -AIR
replies.txt_content: 找不到大钥匙呀呀，boss地下城怎么去？

-AIR 发表于 2015-6-15 17:37
找不到大钥匙呀呀，boss地下城怎么去？
为什么不去看看说明呢 _(:з」∠)_

钥匙：

林克会在旅途中找到不同种类的钥匙。它们当然很有用

小钥匙
最常见的钥匙，这种钥匙可以用来开任何锁住的箱子

大钥匙
也称作为boss的钥匙，这种钥匙只能在boss地下城中找到，并且只会在锁住的箱子里找到。大钥匙只能用来打开颜色对应的门

骷髅钥匙
骷髅钥匙可以打开不同的锁住的箱子，boss门也可以打开。当然如果用来打开boss门，这种钥匙就会损坏，所以用之前还是斟酌一下吧

replies.author: -AIR
replies.txt_content:
1120854593 发表于 2015-6-15 18:13
为什么不去看看说明呢 _(:з」∠)_
